## Getting Started with GitHub

### 1. Create a GitHub Account
- Go to [github.com](https://github.com)
- Sign up for free

### 2. Install Git

# For macOS
brew install git

# For Ubuntu/Debian
sudo apt-get install git

# For Windows
# Download from git-scm.com
